Plot: Belle, whose father is imprisoned by the Beast, offers herself instead, unaware her captor to be an enchanted prince. Belle is a girl who is dissatisfied with life in a small provincial French town, constantly trying to fend off the misplaced "affections" of conceited Gaston. The Beast is a prince who was placed under a spell because he could not love. A wrong turn taken by Maurice, Belle's father, causes the two to meet.
